Medium: Six-channel video (color, sound), projectors, tripods, video cassette players, and synthetic polymer paint on fiberglass
Dimensions: Each sphere, approximately 18" (45.7 cm) in diameter. Overall dimensions variable, Museum installation 11' 5" x 34' 9" x 28' (347.9 x 1059.1 x 853.4 cm)
Title: Six
